file_content.text: Don't you know it's rude to make me come out in a storm like this? We should just seal the passage behind us, trapping you in here forever.
Not an option. Saresh wants the corpses. No bodies, no bonus.
Wouldn't want to upset your new boss, would you, Lorman?
Yeah, don't make her mad.
It's Minister Lorman! And I don't answer to Saresh. We're partners!
To Saresh, you're just a lackey. She'll turn on you the first chance she gets.
She'll betray you.
The Outlander is right. But if you surrender now and beg for mercy, I might let you live.
It's not Lorman's call. The GenoHaradan always finish the job.
You don't have to do Saresh's bidding, Lorman. You're better than that.
Don't answer to her.
So you traded groveling to Acina for groveling to Saresh. You're pathetic, Lorman.
You disgust me.
Don't do this. There's still time to make things right.
Rethink this, Minister.
You'll die, the same as her.
Then you share her fate.
The Outlander is more merciful than I am. I would listen to her.
The Outlander is more merciful than I am. I would listen to him.
You should have surrendered, Lorman.
The Alliance commander is more merciful than I am. I would listen to her.
The Alliance commander is more merciful than I am. I would listen to him.
The Alliance commander is right. But if you surrender now and beg for mercy, I might let you live.
